text: While on a [[plane]] with this property (namely, [[Mabar]]), the plane consumes the life force of living things. Living creatures rapidly and continuously suffers necrotic damage. A creature that is incapacitated by this damage immediately dies and its body crumbles into ash. Natives of the plane, creatures that have resistance or immunity to necrotic damage, and creatures under the effects of a [[death ward]] spell are immune to the effects of this property.
title: Hunger of Mabar
tooltip: universal property: living creatures rapidly and continuously suffer necrotic damage until they crumble into ash
